RejectionReason.name: Unclear Photo
RejectionReason.description: Photo is blurry or dog is not clearly visible

RejectionReason.name: No Dog Visible
RejectionReason.description: No dog visible in the submitted photo

RejectionReason.name: Duplicate Report
RejectionReason.description: This dog has already been reported

RejectionReason.name: Outside Service Area
RejectionReason.description: Location is outside the service boundary

RejectionReason.name: Invalid Location
RejectionReason.description: GPS coordinates do not match photo EXIF data

RejectionReason.name: Duplicate Image
RejectionReason.description: Image matches a previously submitted report
